content:
In one of the communities of Dnipropetrovsk region, the enemy drone attacked a car, is dead and wounded.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak.

“In the Mirovsky community in Nikopol region, he kissed a hostile Dron Kamikadze. A 39-year-old man was killed. Another, 43 years old, is injured. He was hospitalized in a state of moderate, ”he said.

In addition, the head of the Ova added that today shelling of the area lasts from the morning.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Dnipropetrovsk at nightknocked down drones and rocketsMultiple power facilities have been damaged.
title: The shock drone hit a car in Nikopol region: a man was killed
description: This was reported by the head of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak. “In the Mirovsky community, ...
author: Army Inform
